item.description:
Meet up with members of your friendly neighborhood atheist society, and see if you don't make some new friends. These brunches are a wonderful opportunity for new members to get to know folks in the group, and for long-time members to reconnect with like-minded people.

At our monthly brunches, we often pass the hat for some good cause. This time around, we'll be chipping in for donations to the Secular Student Alliance, as at http://www.secularstudents.org. I expect that we'll have a local SSA rep on hand to say something about that really excellent organization.
item.name: July Blasphemy Brunch
